A post shared by srkajol/Bollywood (@srkajolbollywood) on Oct 16, 2018 at 10:30am PDT
title: SRK, Kajol & Rani Recreate The Iconic Pose To Celebrate 20 Glorious Years Of Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
description: To mark the film's anniversary, Dharma Productions hosted a grand party for the entire team and the pictures and videos that have resurfaced proves that it was one starry evening.The starry evening was attended by Kareena Kapoor Khan, Twinkle Khanna, Neha Dhupia, Shweta Bachchan Nanda, Sidharth Malhotra, Janhvi Kapoor, Ishaan Khatter, Zoya Akhtar, Ananya Pandey and Tara Sutaria.
